summary: Adds two new Conjuration spells. Both conjure an ethereal dragon, one summons a standard one for a minute, the other conjures a thrall. (Ancient Fire Dragon type - Dragon Variant 05)
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new Conjuration spells. Both conjure an ethereal dragon, one summons a standard one for a minute, the other conjures a thrall. (Ancient Fire Dragon type - Dragon Variant 05)
: Features :
- You can find the thrall tome in the Archmage\'s Quarters, on the enchanting table.
- You can find the standard tome in the Arcanaeum, on the corner of Urag\'s desk.

: Bugs/Problems :
- I experienced the following while testing:
:- The dragon can only be summoned outdoors, it won\'t allow inside.
:- When you summon the dragon outdoors, it will be friendly, but it won\'t stay with you, it will fly around the area your in, it will be friendly to non-agressive NPCs, but will kill any potential enemies in a large radius near you. I recommend using [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30408]Kace Auto Loot[/url].
author: dmcthunder999
